title: Rheumatoid arthritis. Targeted interventions can minimize joint destruction.
summary: Rheumatoid arthritis can cause joint erosion and deformity, pain, stiffness, and decreased function and range of motion. ...In this article, Drs Williams and Fye discuss articular and extra-articular manifestations of rheumatoid arthritis as well as th â€¦
abstract: Rheumatoid arthritis can cause joint erosion and deformity, pain, stiffness, and decreased function and range of motion. Early diagnosis is crucial to prevent permanent joint damage. In this article, Drs Williams and Fye discuss articular and extra-articular manifestations of rheumatoid arthritis as well as the evolving treatment approaches to this complex disease.
